name: Escape from the nuclear plant
description:
Background of the game

You are an employee of an underground nuclear power plant. Suddenly there is an accident in the underground nuclear power plant and it starts to fall down continuously, can you collect the 3 keys to escape from the plant?

Gameplay

You can use the keyboard "A" and "D" to control your player's left and right movement, and "space" to control your player's jump.
